sentences: Adam MacDougall (born August 1974 in New York City, New York), is the keyboardist who replaced Rob Clores in The Black Crowes in time to record Warpaint in July 2007.
Previously, he was a member of The Ben Taylor Band and Furslide, and he has also toured with Macy Gray and Patti Rothberg.
Macy Gray, The Trouble with Being Myself, July 15, 2003
Jason Darling, Night Like My Head, October 7, 2003
Lili Haydn, Place Between Places, April 1, 2008
Julian Casablancas, Phrazes for the Young, October 20, 2009
Mia Doi Todd, Cosmic Ocean Ship, May 17, 2011
Phil Lesh and Friends, Various Performances, 2012
